name: Unreal Island
description:
This is a delightful cartoon astronaut game!
You will play the role of a cute astronaut, immersed in a colorful and vibrant flat world. Various attacking objects are constantly falling in the sky, and you need to cleverly avoid them to protect your life.
Every time you successfully dodge an attack, you will receive a reward of five points! But be careful, you only have three lives, so try to avoid being hit by attacking objects.
The entire game screen is colorful and full of vitality, while the background music is lively and dynamic, adding more fun to your gaming experience! Get ready for the challenge and become the bravest astronaut!
